forgot_password.title: Forgot your password?
forgot_password.instructions: No problem. Enter your email address and we will email you a password reset link.
forgot_password.error_400: There is a problem with the email you submitted
forgot_password.error_404: We could not find an account with that email address
forgot_password.error_500: Oops. The server ran into an error. Please contact support

reset_password.check_email: We have sent a code to reset your password to
reset_password.missing_password2: please re-type your password to confirm
reset_password.no_token_provided: Must provide a password reset token
